title: Lepcha (1977) Genesis Portion
description: Lepcha language or Róng language is a Himalayish language spoken by the Lepcha people in Sikkim, India, and parts of West Bengal, Nepal, and Bhutan.

language.name: Lepcha
language.area: Sikkim, Dzongu District; West Bengal, Darjeeling District, Kalimpong. Also in Bhutan, Nepal.
